sections.heading: Court-appointed special advocates (CASA); purposeThe purpose of CASA is to advocate for timely placement of children in permanent, safe, and stable homes
sections.text: Acts 1991, No. 235, ยง4, eff. Jan. 1, 1992; Acts 1997, No. 904, ยง1, eff. July 10, 1997; Acts 1999, No. 275, ยง1, eff. July 1, 1999.
